abstract: Works in Progress column; Gulliver's Gate, interactive miniature replica of world and its highlights, is being constructed by seven design and art teams on different continents, with works slated to consolidate for massive display at Times Square location in April 2017; project chief exec Eiran Gazit says miniature world is utopian, boasting terrorist-free airports, on-time trains and depiction of Washington, DC, without bipartisan rancor.

headline.print_headline: The World Is Coming to West 44th
headline.main: Gulliver’s Gate, a Huge Miniature World, Will Rise Near Times Square

snippet: The $40 million project will depict highlights of the world, from Beijing to New York, at 1:87 scale models displayed in a 49,000-square-foot exhibit space....
lead_paragraph: The $40 million project will depict highlights of the world, from Beijing to New York, at 1:87 scale models displayed in a 49,000-square-foot exhibit space.
